# max

## 512

~~~
max -i a5 `
-a play.max.com/video/watch/5f6c42f7-c350-4548-be25-fda89b88782a/9bbd5097-4385-4f69-8516-ea2b4ed8b438

curl -O https://akm.prd.media.h264.io/21caec8a-cc23-4a5c-9cf7-56c62e2e554b/a/1_16014e/a5.mp4

bin/mp4split a5.mp4
~~~

## 1024

~~~
max -i a2 `
-a play.max.com/video/watch/b3b1410a-0c85-457b-bcc7-e13299bea2a8/1623fe4c-ef6e-4dd1-a10c-4a181f5f6579

curl -O https://akm.prd.media.h264.io/59da086b-1d1e-48fa-b318-782408318b54/a/0_fa3c08/a2.mp4

bin/mp4split a2.mp4
~~~
